segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, towel in hand over a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet is running full tilt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows steadily, unnoticed by her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms at her feet, widening slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the cabinet doors hang open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar sits there, tempting the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on the tilting stool, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, expectant and still.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a serene garden beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so ordinary, yet full of hidden tension.
segments.speaker: PAR
